meaningMnemonic: A <radical>flowers</radical> <radical>net</radical> is upon your <radical>forehead</radical> in the <radical>evening</radical>. These appear on your head at night whenever you are having a <kanji>dream</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: You <kanji>dream</kanji> about cows saying "<reading>moo</reading> (む), moo, moo!"
